case.title: I want someone to love me - 28 (London )
case.text:
Hi ,
Thanks for stopping by . Am a lovely decent hardworking humble black lady looking for a good man to love me and spend the rest of my life with him . Am about giving up on love now as it seems no man wants to get serious . I do want to have a serious long lasting relationship with a matured white or black man . Have tried to look for a decent man but it seems they are too hard to find these days . Message me if you feel the same as me and lets go on a date and see how things work . Thanks your pic gets mine
